item.title: More littering at our doorstep, 1st December
item.description:
Can the CCTV cameras in the street be checked to find who is responsible for this? Thanks

item.title: One of four dead trees has fallen today, 1st December
item.description:
This has been reported everal times throughout the past 2 years. Newlon has left the trees to die and today one of four has fallen. This has damaaged the house near by. We are not safe with these trees!!!!!

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Powerscroft Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Litter everywhere, 1st December
item.description:

item.title: Dog mess is constant, 1st December
item.description:
Grassed area which is used by children is constantly being used by dog walkers who fail to clean up after their dogs,,, both grassed areas on Lancaster estate!! It’s disgusting and dangerous!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lancaster Street, Elephant and Castle, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Disgusting bin chambers, 1st December
item.description:
Haven’t seen these bin chambers cleaned in years ! They are disgustingly dirty, they are within Lingfield house ,,, there are 3 and need a good jet wash , we don’t seem to have had our estate cleaned in a very long time , walking around with a broom is not cleaning !!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lancaster Street, Elephant and Castle, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping bed and draw unit, 1st December
item.description:
There has been a double mattress with base unit and Chester draw unit dumped at the corner of Ridge Road and Kent Road. This has happened today between 8.45am and 6.45pm today the 1st December. I noticed it when I got home from work. It was totally blocking the pathway so I had to tidy it up to make safe for pedestrians and also it was all moving in the strong winds.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ridge Road, Edmonton, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
